item.title: About
item.description: There are plenty of blogs on tech and gadgets. Engadget, Gizmodo, C|net, you name it. Why do we need another one? I use all sorts of technologies to make my life easier. I thoroughly research products before I buy them. Once in a while, when something fails, I need to go back and fix something or reconfigure some software that I setup ages ago. The only problem is keeping everything in my memory, especially those that involve multiple steps.
